slides.title: 50 Years of Waiting Over
slides.key_fact: In 2004-05, Chelsea won their first Premier League title in 50 years, ending a historic drought.
slides.visual_description: Sweeping wide shot of Stamford Bridge stadium under a dramatic, overcast sky. Rain-slicked pitch reflects the floodlights. Focus is on a lone, triumphant Chelsea player in a retro kit mid-celebration, arms raised, rain plastering hair to forehead. Impending storm adds tension.

caption: 50 years. That's how long Chelsea fans waited for *this* moment. 🤯 It wasn't just a win, it was the end of a drought that felt like an eternity for supporters. You HAVE to see how it all unfolded... Swipe up for the story!

aesthetic.name: Pop Art / Comic
aesthetic.art_style: bold pop art comic book illustration with strong outlines and dynamic composition
aesthetic.color_palette: primary red #FF0000, bright yellow #FFFF00, bold blue #0000FF, jet black #000000
aesthetic.lighting: flat bold lighting with strong black outlines, no gradients
aesthetic.texture: halftone dots, Ben-Day dots, bold outlines, flat color fills
aesthetic.typography_style: BOLD ALL-CAPS comic book lettering with thick black outline
aesthetic.background_style: bright solid colors or classic halftone dot patterns
